name: The Mantle of the Rising Sun
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
The Mantle of the Rising Sun affects its user's physical resistance.
